name: Greek Meatballs
description: Send your taste buds straight to the Mediterranean! Packed with fragrant herbs and spices, these juicy meatballs are not only a delight for your taste buds, but they also come with a host of health benefits that make them a smart choice for a wholesome meal. Ground beef is an excellent source of high-quality protein, and essential vitamins and minerals like iron and zinc.

ingredients.name: Greek Dressing Mix or Chicken Souvlaki Seasoning

preparation:
1. Preheat oven to 375° F (190° C).
  2. In a mixing bowl, soak bread in milk. Add remaining ingredients, combining well by hand.
  3. Form into 16 meatballs. Place on Sheet Pan lined with Sheet Pan Liner.
  4. Bake for 20 minutes.
tips:
Serve atop whole-grain pasta with prepared Marinara Sauce. 

Serve in a pita pocket or whole-grain submarine rolls with shredded lettuce, sliced tomatoes, cucumbers and prepared Dillicious Tzatziki.

Serve as an appetizer — make meatballs bite-sized, place on skewers and serve with prepared Epicure Dip.
